idle_timeout.description: Global idle timeout in seconds. LSP servers will be shut down if no documents are open for this duration.

smart_wait.description: Wait for LSP servers to be fully ready (initialized) before executing requests.

server.description: Server definitions keyed by language ID (e.g., 'rust', 'python').

args.description: Arguments to pass to the command.

initialization_options.description: Initialization options to pass to the LSP server during the 'initialize' request.

run_tool_config.description: Configuration for the 'run' shell execution tool.

allowed.description: Always-allowed commands (e.g., ['git', 'make']). Use ['*'] for unrestricted execution.

language_commands.description: Language-specific allowed commands. Activated when matching files exist in workspace.
